name: Spaceship Racer: Portal
description:
In Spaceship Racer: Portal you fly with different "spaceships" through very different worlds, destroying asteroids and improving and buying new spaceships, in retro pixel acade style, trying to get an ever higher high score.


Special Spaceships

A standard spaceship is too boring for you?
How about a donut ship?

upgrades

Improve your chance and improve your spaceship or upgrade the powerups

Power Up

Collect power ups to help you with your high score
